title: LLaVA-CoT

definitions.Summary: A brief outline in which the model summarizes the forthcoming task.
definitions.Caption: A description of the relevant parts of an image (if present), focusing on elements related to the question.
definitions.Reasoning: A detailed analysis in which the model systematically considers the question.
definitions.Conclusion: A concise summary of the answer, providing a final response based on the preceding reasoning.

summary: LLaVA-CoT is a novel VLM designed to conduct autonomous multistage reasoning, capable of generating four distinct stages: summary, caption, reasoning, and conclusion. The model summarizes the forthcoming task, describes relevant parts of an image, systematically considers the question, and provides a final response based on the preceding reasoning.
